topics.body:
You know what sucks? My professor moving the deadline for the comic to tomorrow. Just because he suspended the last 3 meeting does not mean he can move back a deadline. Now I'm pulling a all-nighter to see this through.

He better like it or else I'll rip open his throat with a rusty spoon.

topics.body:
Gooooood Morning!

"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55002c1163687252a9750d00#post_55002c1163687252a9750d00
[bq="Too_Offensive"]According to screenwriter Buzz Dixon, Optimus Prime was to have a cameo in My Little Pony: The Movie. He was to be asked by one of the Ponies for aid against their antagonist, only to disappoint them for some reason, leaving the Pony no recourse but to try and enlist the aid of a drunken Shipwreck from G.I. Joe (no, really). Prime's (and Shipwreck's) scene was cut from the script at Hasbro's behest.
:I
[/bq]
Woah, you mean that one of the crossovers that I am expecting with hype in my fucking life in this fandom was about to get real?
Damn...
